name: Easy-Note
shortDescription:
asy Note: Notes app using JetPack Compose and MVVM with a clean architecture approach.

This app shows the usage of the new Navigation Architecture Component in collaboration with the Jetpack Compose.
longDescription:
asy Note: Notes app using JetPack Compose and MVVM with a clean architecture approach.

This app shows the usage of the new Navigation Architecture Component in collaboration with the Jetpack Compose.
